review_data.title: Good Italian Restaurant
review_data.content: Authentic Italian restaurant, not fancy, but the quality of the food beats many much more expensive restaurants in Zurich. It's always a pleasure to go there, staff is very nice and attentive. Dishes to be recommended: Ballanzoni and Lasagne.

review_data.title: For what it is very good.
review_data.content: Keep in mind there are 5 Italian restaurants less than 500 Meyers away. This restaurant is a solid quality restaurant on the low price side. You can always get a table. Food is solid. Pizza is good. Worth going, particularly with kids

review_data.title: Very good italian place
review_data.content: Very good food. The ambience was great. The price is reasonable if you take into account the taste and the portions. The service was also excellent. We will definitely go back in the future.

review_data.title: Nice Italian restaurant in Enge

review_data.title: Pizza with Truffle Oil !
review_data.content: In my view, one of the best pizzerias (if not the best) in Zurich. Service is friendly, food is very solid. I highly recommend the pizzas. Decent atmosphere.

review_data.title: Onwership changed in 2012
review_data.content: New ownership, but old staff. Almost everything stays unchanged, except for the tables and dishes that are better presented. Prices slightly increased. Anyway, it remains a good restaurant to be tested. Family friendly attitude.

review_data.title: Very good food. The Italian wife of the...
review_data.content: Very good food. The Italian wife of the manager Giovanni is most of the time cooking à la minute. The food is very good and typical Italian. Very generous dishes. If you are on a diet, this restaurant is to avoid. Service sometimes slow, but...More
